org.mule.munit.common.mocking
Class EndpointMocker

java.lang.Object
  org.mule.munit.common.mocking.EndpointMocker

public class EndpointMocker
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a Munit Tool to create Endpoint mocks

This is though as a fluent pattern implementation

Usage:

new EndpointMocker(muleContext).expectEndpointWithAddress("http://localhost:8080").thenReturn(muleMessage);

Constructor Summary
